title: Same troll in many matches over many weeks.
body:
I have blocked, reported and muted this guy many times, my teams have done the same but yet somehow I keep getting him on my Twisted Treeline team. I know others have also reported him over the few weeks gone as I have added a couple of them as friends as we played well in the game, heck he even we afk which he didn't feed  and we won the match 2 v 3, but alas still in game, still allowed to troll/feed and abuse people no matter how many people report. 
Getting tired of the toxicity in this game.

replies.body:
Sounds like you're playing Twisted Treeline. The amount of people playing that is much lower than Summoners Rift, so if you queue straight after a game you'll likely get put with the same guy every time.

My advice is, if you get a troll then wait 5 minutes after the game, then re-queue.
Yeah, doesn't stop them from being queued on other days but thats what I do now. If I lose I will wait for 5 mins as well.
I don't understand why anyone would troll the TT queue, it takes so long to get a match you want to make it worthwhile...
